title: Endless Love
description: One threat, two people, a love against all odds.At last, Bria and Damien are happily planning their future together.Until a trip to London reveals new challenges and their future depends on their commitment to put the past behind them and move forward. Damien never cared for odds, he bended them to his will.With Bria at his side, he’s ready to face whatever comes their way. They believe they can overcome any hardship.But, when Bria’s life is in danger, just how far will Damien go to show his love and keep her safe. Can love truly conquer all?
author: Bianca Borell
